name: Ballet Fashion Show: Gold
description:
If your little girl is a Ballerina Fashionista this is the app for you! You can create your own beautiful prima ballerina princess doll in Ballet Fashion Show, a virtual paper doll app that lets you make and dress up a pretty ballet dancer ready to take the stage! Select her skin tone, eye color, hair color, hair style and outfit to make this cute paper doll look just like you!

Have fun dressing up your ballerina character from a wardrobe full of pretty ballet dresses (and some hip workout clothes), lots of dance shoes with ribbons and bows, jeweled tiaras and crowns, glittering jewelry- a treasure trove of necklaces, bracelets and earrings with all sorts of gems. Don't forget an accessory! There's also lots of fashionable gloves, and tights in every color of the rainbow. She can dance with a magic fairy wand, or a bouquet of beautiful flowers. Pick out your ballerina's hairstyle and customize her features to customize the look of your dancer!

She can even have a little ballerina pet, like a dancing kitten or koala bear or an otter with a big bow- too cute! Your ballerina can model her new fancy ballet costume in many different places like an opulent theater stage, a modern ballet studio with a barre, in front of a fairy tale castle, a beautiful snow winter wonderland, an enchanted forest filled with wildflowers, a blossoming spring flower garden, and more magical places!
Lots of fun sparkles come on-screen for every new selection. You can roll the dice to get a new ballerina with a different, random outfit every time.

When you're done giving her a beauty makeover, you can save your fairy to your device's Photo Album. Show off your fashionista skills by creating endless outfits for your ballerina dressup doll- you can play for hours!

Features:
-Game is for girls ages three and older.
-Includes over 20 dresses with tons of accessories, 10 ballerina pets and 9 different backgrounds.
-Beautiful graphics by children's book artist Laura Tallardy.
-Child-friendly!
